contents:
ORDER
PER CURIAM.
AND NOW, this 7th day of March, 2014, the Petition for Allowance of Appeal is GRANTED. The issue as stated by petitioner is:
(1) Whether an alleged delinquent’s Sixth Amendment Confrontation Clause rights were violated by the admission of a video-taped forensic interview when defense counsel did not attempt to cross-examine the victim at the contested hearing.
